inspiration:
Domain: Software development workflows and code review
    Target users: Engineering teams at startups and scale-ups (5-50 engineers)
    Primary outcome: Reduce context switching and improve code review velocity without sacrificing quality
    Constraints: Must integrate with GitHub/GitLab, minimal initial configuration, works with existing workflows
    UX rules: Fits naturally into developer workflow, actionable notifications only, no dashboard babysitting

phases.goal: Generate 1 different startup idea(s) based on the inspiration
phases.desired_outcome: List of concrete startup ideas with clear value propositions

phases.goal: Consolidate all feedback and output final startup ideas in JSON format
phases.desired_outcome: JSON array of 1 startup idea(s) with all required fields

ideas.title: CodeSync
ideas.description: CodeSync is a real-time collaborative code review platform that streamlines the feedback process for engineering teams, enabling simultaneous code reviews and discussions within the IDE.
ideas.target_users: Engineering teams at startups and scale-ups (5-50 engineers) who prioritize efficient code reviews and seamless collaboration.
ideas.primary_outcome: CodeSync aims to significantly reduce turnaround time for code reviews, promoting faster iterations and increased code quality through synchronized feedback and discussions.
must_haves: Seamless integration with GitHub/GitLab for automatic syncing of repositories and pull requests
Real-time collaborative code editing and commenting features within the IDE
Notification system for actionable feedback and discussions
Version control and history tracking to maintain code integrity
In-line suggestions and code highlighting for easy identification of changes
constraints: Ensuring data security and compliance with industry standards for code confidentiality
Managing scalability for teams of varying sizes without compromising performance
Balancing feature-rich functionality with a clean and intuitive user interface
non_goals: Becoming a comprehensive project management tool unrelated to code review
Overwhelming users with excessive notifications or unnecessary features
